amplify 0.1.0

    Analyzing ddCt qPCR with amplify Performing Library Quantification QC

    Function reference

    Reading in Data

    One-stop-shop for reading in and tidying PCR result files

    pcr_tidy()
    Tidy a PCR Excel File

    Visualizing the Plate

    Functions to visualize a variable - like Ct or sample name - as though you were looking at the plate

    pcr_plate_view()
    View sample plating layout

    Comparative (ddCT) qPCR

    Functions to calculate relative quantities, reset control samples/genes, plot data, plan experiments, etc.

    pcr_plan()
    Plan PCR experiment
    pcr_plan_report()
    Create a report from a PCR plan
    pcr_plot()
    Plot qPCR results
    pcr_control()
    (Re)calculate Delta Ct mean based on given control probe
    pcr_rq()
    (Re)calculate rq for a given sample

    Standard Curve qPCR

    Functions to calculate concentrations as well as assess quality of standard curve and efficiency.

    pcr_lib_calc()
    Calculate library PCR concentrations
    pcr_lib_qc()
    Create library prep quality control data
    pcr_lib_qc_plot_conc()
    Plot concentration of libraries across samples
    pcr_lib_qc_plot_dil()
    Plot standard dilutions compared to a perfect dilution
    pcr_lib_qc_plot_outliers()
    Plot mean centered samples without putative outliers
    pcr_lib_qc_plot_slope()
    Plot the log of library quantities vs Ct
    pcr_lib_qc_report()
    Generate visual library prep pcr quality control report
    pcr_calc_slope()
    Recalcuate standard slope of quantity vs Ct

    Miscellaneous

    Miscellaneous Utilities

    pad_zero()
    Add leading 0 to sample names
    dummy_rna_conc
    Example data of RNA samples with concentrations
